entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 in the evening then steady.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 12 in the evening then steady. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
